page.title: 11BIOGRAPHY
page.content: {D.K.Whitfield}runs three businesses, mainly by himself.He is an{Insurance {Consultant}and owns a{Building Company specialising in altering houses into self-contained flats and bedsitters. Mr Whitfield also owns a number of houses, mainly in Cambridge, which are let in self-contained units numbering about 100, and inhabited by approx.150 tenants. A typical day begins at 8.30 am. dealing with queries, answering the telephone and reading the post. At 10.45 he leaves for Cambridge, where he purchases building materials and visits tenants. For the rest of the day until early evening he inspects building sites.Later he interviews possible tenants, collects rent and sorts out problems. During the evening he visits clients about insurance and returns home between 8 and 11 pm.
